long_description: The REI Salix jacket cloaks a boy in waterproof, breathable and insulated protection when they venture out into the wet and cold. 2-layer Elements(R) waterproof/breathable fabric is windproof to 60mph; fully sealed seams block out moisture. Quilted taffeta lining adds a layer of warmth. 3-panel hood with elastic binding, adjustable cuffs and drop tail enhance protection and comfort. The REI Salix jacket features zippered hand pockets and a zippered chest pocket with internal media port. Waterproof front zipper and hand pocket zippers help keep moisture out.
short_description: The REI Salix jacket cloaks a boy in waterproof, breathable and insulated protection when they venture out into the wet and cold.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
